actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to authorize social security coverage, under the agreement entered into with the State of Connecticut pursuant to section 218 of the Social Security Act, for certain employees of the City of Hartford who are not members of such City's municipal retirement plan, and to validate the past coverage of such employees in cases where wage reports were duly filed and the prescribed equivalent of social security taxes was duly paid.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Authorizes modification of the agreement by which employees of Connecticut are eligible for benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance Benefits) of the Social Security Act to include coverage for specified employees of Hartford, Connecticut. Authorizes coverage before enactment of this Act under specified circumstances if the State paid the required employment tax before such date.

titles.title: A bill to authorize social security coverage, under the agreement entered into with the State of Connecticut pursuant to section 218 of the Social Security Act, for certain employees of the City of Hartford who are not members of such City's municipal retirement plan, and to validate the past coverage of such employees in cases where wage reports were duly filed and the prescribed equivalent of social security taxes was duly paid.
